item.title: 汤姆-海耶斯的行业禁令在英国被驳回后被 FCA 撤销

item.title: 动漫明星的先锋人才公司倒闭了
item.description: 美国顶级虚拟动漫明星艺人经纪公司本周关闭，客户称该公司扣留了数十万美元。【原文：The top US talent agency for virtual anime stars shut down this week, with clients saying the company withheld hundreds of thousands of dollars.】

item.title: 微软正在调查中国黑客是否通过警报得知漏洞
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，微软公司正在调查其网络安全公司早期预警系统是否泄密，导致中国黑客在其SharePoint服务漏洞得到修补之前就利用了这些漏洞。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is investigating whether a leak from its early alert system for cybersecurity companies allowed Chinese hackers to exploit flaws in its SharePoint service before they were patched, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 电子商务初创公司 OpenStore 将估值削减 95%，并任命新首席执行官
item.description: 电子商务初创公司 OpenStore 在新一轮融资中将其估值从近 10 亿美元降至 5000 万美元，准备将其重点缩小到打造男装品牌 Jack Archer 上。【原文：E-commerce startup OpenStore is slashing its valuation from nearly $1 billion to just $50 million in a new round of funding as it prepares to narrow its focus to building up menswear brand Jack Archer.】

item.title: 高盛退出八年后重返 ETF 首席做市商行列

item.title: 英国 TalkTalk 公司与支持者 Ares 达成 1 亿英镑融资协议
item.description: 陷入困境的英国宽带供应商 TalkTalk Telecom Group Plc 在完成重大财务重组不到一年后，同意从其支持者 Ares Management Corp. 那里获得 1 亿英镑（1.34 亿美元）的新融资。【原文：Struggling UK broadband provider TalkTalk Telecom Group Plc agreed to a new £100 million ($134 million) funding deal from its backer Ares Management Corp., less than a year after completing a major financial restructuring.】
